message: I'm excited to offer you this incredible product at a special price. I think you'll love it!
I appreciate your offer, but I was thinking more along the lines of $9500. I'm really interested in the product, but I need to stay within my budget.
I understand you're looking to stay within your budget, but I'm not willing to go as low as $9500. I'm willing to meet you halfway at $10500, but I'm not sure if I can go any lower than that.
I appreciate your willingness to meet me halfway, but I'm still a bit above my target. I'm willing to go up to $10000, but I'm not sure I can go any higher than that. Can you consider that?
